attributes.action: to abolish pregnant nonsettler students/illegal immigrants right to stay in U.K. using their baby as a Visa to stay and eventually entitles benefits.
attributes.additional_details: To abolish pregnant non settlers' right to stay in U.K. using their babies as a Visa and eventually get the right to benefits and housing. I know of few people who are now living comfortably with benefits without having worked for years enduring days of freezing climate and unfair treatment and victimization in unhumane work conditions!
